Package com.example.beginnerdemo.dao

Interface PersonDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
FakePersonAccessDataService, PersonDataAccessService
public interface PersonDao
This class is an interface that will be implemented by different database service class. Example is 'FakePersonAccessDataService.java'
